title: NBreadcrumbProps
description: Neuron breadcrumb component for displaying hierarchical navigation paths. The last item is rendered as the current page (non-clickable).

label.description: Display text for the breadcrumb item.

href.description: Navigation URL for the breadcrumb item. Omit for the current (last) item.

items.description: Array of breadcrumb items forming the navigation path.

separator.description: Custom separator character between breadcrumb items.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
